tagLine: landing spot for potential commercial suppliers
startupOverview:
Should the delivery of goods by drones be permitted in the near future, the transport costs for the providers could drop massively. My approach is that the recipient of the goods also benefits from this. 
This platform offers private landing pads for the delivery of parcels, food, medicines or the like. The platform sees itself as an intermediary between the provider (such as Amazon, Otto, etc.) and the recipient of the goods. Both we and the recipient benefit from this. The providers in turn get a huge network of landing sites. The model is similar to AirBnb
problemYouAreSolving: Shorten delivery times for goods of all kinds
productDescription: landing spot plattform for potential commercial suppliers and become part of the new future of delivery business
whatMakesYourProductUnique: To my knowledge, this service does not yet exist in the world
productRoadMap: Building an ecosystem around the platform e.g. boxes for package pickup including landing pad or drone pilots service delivering packages
marketDrivers:
Challenges: Different legal requirements in the countries

Market driver:
Customer want to get their goods delivered faster and faster
Deliveries with drones are much cheaper and also more environmentally friendly
Drones do not get stuck in traffic and can deliver goods more reliably
competition: All the big logistics companies like DHL, UPS etc and of course Amazon or Google
strengthAgainstCompetitors: Still unknown, small and very flexible to customer needs
revenueSources: Brokerage fee for each delivered item
salesStrategy:
Partnerships with large logistics companies or also e.g. Lieferando

Different pricing models:
per package (fixed or percentage of the value of goods)
per landing site (daily, monthly, yearly)
traction:
social media
press
Hamburg Award or other startups events worldwide
pilotsCustomers: At the moment the platform is under construction. In addition, there are still legal hurdles to be cleared in almost all countries.
metrics: The delivery of goods by drones will become a reality in the near future. Success depends on getting as many users / site providers onto the platform as quickly as possible to be sexy for the big logistics companies. There are millions of front yards worldwide waiting to be delivered by drones.
foundersQualification: successful sales engineer from the software industry
howImpact:
Role model for drone delivery in rural areas

Reduction of pollutants in the greater Hamburg area
whatDegreeSustainability: This model will make many local delivery trips obsolete. This means less traffic on the road and less pollution.
connectionToHamburg: i was born in Hamburg and have lived in the city for 54 years.
